body:
On `master`, these are the errors:

```RuntimeError: Expected tensor to have CPU Backend, but got tensor with CUDA Backend (while checking arguments for CPU_tensor_apply)```

```RuntimeError: Expected tensor to have CUDA Backend, but got tensor with CPU Backend (while checking arguments for CUDA_tensor_apply4)```

```RuntimeError: Expected tensor to have CPU Backend, but got tensor with CUDA Backend (while checking arguments for CPU_tensor_apply)```
